annotations.description: The Clover Club is classic which dates back to 1896. It is named after the Friars-like organization which met at the Bellevue-Stratford Hotel which was the s...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Clover Club

textContent:
2oz Gin
5 Fresh Raspberries
.75oz Lemon juice
.75oz Simple Syrup
1 Egg white

Shake vigorously and pour into coupe
Garnish with raspberries or blackberry or lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBodHfg4J0g

---

2oz Gin
.5oz Raspberry syrup
.75oz Lemon juice
1 Egg white

Shake vigorously and pour
Garnish with Cherry or blackberry or lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zws_MdZS4_0

---

2 oz Raspberry Syrup
1.5 oz Dry Gin
.5 oz Dry Vermouth
White of One Egg

Shake Well, Strain into Cocktail Glass and Serve.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ui7dOJkmpl4
title: Clover Club
